reviewText: Jon Brealey and his Empty Mind Films organization produce very high quality and informative documentary videos on martial arts and Asian culture. I own almost the entire collection because of the value that his work offers. Warriors of China is just one example of the superb work that he does. I would cheerfully recommend anything that he directs and produces.

I was expecting this to have more external styles with it having shaolin monks on the cover but it was mostly internal styles which are fine but I wanted to see more external styles. It was still interesting and  I did learn some new things about the internal arts
